Title: InkSpot
Description: Adds SVG runtime support to WPF applications.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Adds SVG runtime support to WPF applications.

The Goal of this project is make a transparent transition between an SVG illustration and your WPF app, so you can use it as easy as you use a JPG image.

Example: Make an SVG Icon with InkScape and use it in a WPF Button
